name: tinydb
description: MCP server for working with TinyDB, a lightweight document database.

tools.name: create_table
tools.description: Creates a new table in the database.

tools.name: insert_document
tools.description: Inserts a document into the specified table.

tools.name: query_documents
tools.description: Queries documents from the specified table.

tools.name: update_documents
tools.description: Updates documents in the specified table.

tools.name: delete_documents
tools.description: Deletes documents from the specified table.

tools.name: purge_table
tools.description: Removes all documents from the specified table.

tools.name: drop_table
tools.description: Drops the specified table from the database.
